title: COSMIC SOUNDSCAPES VOL.1
longDescription:
Inspired by Hans Zimmer and the legend Vangelis, Cosmic Soundscapes Volume 1 is a collection of 12 soundscapes to be used in your film or game, by three-time award-winner Producer Phraktal.


Whether you're looking for sound for a Cinematic scene from a cyberpunk world or need to build tension in your game drifting through Space on a bed of subtle ominous sound fx, your soundtrack can make or break a project. This collection of tracks is inspired by science fiction and crafted to let your audience imagine what space/the future might sound like in other areas of our galaxy.


Potential use cases; sci-fi films/games, cinematic trailers.


Created for lovers of soundtrack music, filmmakers and game developers.


Preview:

Cosmic Soundscapes Vol.1 | Phraktal | Morphosis Studio (bandcamp.com)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • A cohesive audio suite of productions to complete your needs from, themes, menu screens & much more!
  • Character theme music.
  • Audio cues are categorized for easy placement.


Number of Audio Wavs: 12

Number of Audio Cues: 12

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz


Important/Additional Notes:

If you have any questions or need further information, please feel free to email us - contact@morphosis.studio
